sidebar.description: Complete your profile and get listed on Yes Job

footer.text: Connect with passionate Horeca professionals for thriving careers

localeSwitcher.title: Languages
localeSwitcher.subTitle: This website is available in the following languages:

auth.loginSubTitle: Welcome back! Please enter your details
auth.registerSubTitle: Create your account in a few clicks!
auth.success: Your account has been created successfully!
auth.error: Something went wrong, please try again later.

hero.title: Find the best job offers in horeca
hero.sub: Whether you're looking for a full-time job, want to earn extra money while studying or need extra money for your vacations - we've got something to suit your needs!

ads.title: We're glad you'd like to advertise with us!
ads.subTitle: YES Job is the best place to find and advertise jobs in the hospitality industry
ads.li4: Distribution in the Google for Jobs recruitment network

publishAds.title: Create an ad
publishAds.descPlaceholder: As a cashier at [Company name], you will be in charge of handling customer transactions accurately and efficiently ...
publishAds.howTo: How should the candidate apply for the offer?
publishAds.viaYesJobSub: You will receive a notification of new applications by email
publishAds.viaExterneSub: The candidate will be redirected to the outside that you specify
publishAds.viaBoth: Application via Yes Job and an external form
publishAds.viaBothSub: The candidate can submit their application via Yes Job or you can redirect them to an external form.
publishAds.contactDetailsSub: These data are only for contacting you in case of ad questions. They will not be displayed anywhere.
publishAds.contactDetailsEmailValidation: Please enter a valid e-mail address.
publishAds.contactDetailsPasswordValidationMin: Password must have at least 8 characters
publishAds.contactDetailsPasswordValidationSpecial: Password must contain at least one special character
publishAds.contactDetailsPasswordValidationNum: Password must contain at least two numbers

contact.title: Do you have a question?
contact.subText: Encountering issues or have questions about our job board? Engage with us through our contact form for swift and professional assistance.

error.notEnoughListing: You don't have any available listing, please upgrade your account.

pricing.headerSubTitle2: Simple, transparent pricing for everyone. Choose a plan that fits your needs.
pricing.headerSubscriptionSubTitle: Additional job listing will cost 59€ per job post.
pricing.headerExtraSubTitle: Get more visibility for your job post and company

free.title: Free plan
free.subTitle: Your first job listing is free

boost.title: Boost {number}
boost.5subTitle: Increase job post visibility with 5 boost
boost.detailsMoreAppearance: Job post will appear more in search results
boost.companySubTitle: Increase your company promotion and visibility
boost.detailsCompanyBanner: Company custom banner on homepage and listing pages for 14 days
boost.detailsCompanySponsored: Featured on our facebook and instagram ads

pricing.detailsApplication: Job application sent directly to your email address
pricing.detailsGetFeatured: Get featured to our social promotions

jobListing.subText: Manage your live and draft job listings here.
jobListing.promotionFailed: No more promotion available, upgrade your account or buy to get more promotion
jobListing.postError: No more job listing available, upgrade your account or buy to get more job listing
jobListing.moreJobListingSub: Upgrade your account and get to list more job vacancy
jobListing.firstJobListingSub: Your first 2 job listing are free
